channel.title: Belief on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Belief on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: I Don’t Believe in God, but I Do Believe in A Lot
item.description: I don’t believe in God. Saying this is easier now than it was when I was a kid, because I was struggling equal parts internally with my lack of faith and externally with the reactions of people in my life when they found out.
